verses.verse: <S%H559>"Say<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'My people!' and to your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H7355><s%> 'My loved one!'

<S%H7378>Contend<s%> with your <S%H517>mother!<s%> <S%H7378>Contend,<s%> for she is not my <S%H802>wife,<s%> neither am I her <S%H376>husband;<s%> and let her put <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> from her <S%H6440>face,<s%> and her <S%H5005>adulteries<s%> from between her <S%H7699>breasts;<s%>

Lest I <S%H6584>strip<s%> her <S%H6174>naked,<s%> and <S%H3322>make<s%> her bare as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that she was <S%H3205>born,<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> her like a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H7896>set<s%> her like a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4191>kill<s%> her with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
<S%H1121>Indeed,<s%> on her children I will have no <S%H7355>mercy;<s%> for they are <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2183>unfaithfulness;<s%>

For their <S%H517>mother<s%> has played the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%> She who <S%H2029>conceived<s%> them has done <S%H3001>shamefully;<s%> for she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'I will go <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H157>lovers,<s%> who <S%H5414>give<s%> me my <S%H3899>bread<s%> and my <S%H4325>water,<s%> my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax,<s%> my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H8250>drink.<s%>'

<S%H7753>Therefore,<s%> behold, I will hedge up your <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H5518>thorns,<s%> and I will <S%H1443>build<s%> a <S%H1447>wall<s%> against <S%H4672>her,<s%> that she can't find her <S%H5410>way.<s%>

She will <S%H7291>follow<s%> after her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> but she <S%H5381>won't<s%> overtake <S%H1245>them;<s%> and she will seek <S%H4672>them,<s%> but won't find <S%H559>them.<s%> Then she will say, <S%H3212><s%> 'I will go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H376>husband;<s%> for then was it <S%H2896>better<s%> with me than <S%H6258>now.<s%>'

For she did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> to her <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which they <S%H6213>used<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> my <S%H1715>grain<s%> in its <S%H6256>time,<s%> and my new <S%H8492>wine<s%> in its <S%H4150>season,<s%> and will <S%H5337>pluck<s%> away my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax<s%> which should have <S%H3680>covered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
Now I will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H5040>lewdness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and no <S%H376>one<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her out of my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
I will also cause all her <S%H4885>celebrations<s%> to <S%H7673>cease:<s%> her <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> her new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> her <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and all her solemn <S%H4150>assemblies.<s%>

I will lay <S%H8074>waste<s%> her <S%H1612>vines<s%> and her fig <S%H8384>trees,<s%> about which she has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H866><s%> 'These are my wages that my <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H7760>me;<s%> and I will make them a <S%H3293>forest,<s%>' and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall eat <S%H398>them.<s%>

I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> on her the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> to which she burned <S%H6999>incense,<s%> when she <S%H5710>decked<s%> herself with her <S%H5141>earrings<s%> and her <S%H2484>jewels,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H6601>"Therefore,<s%> behold, I will allure <S%H3212>her,<s%> and bring her into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> tenderly to <S%H3820>her.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> from <S%H6010>there,<s%> and the valley of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> for a <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H8615>hope;<s%> and she will <S%H6030>respond<s%> <S%H3117>there,<s%> as in the days of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> and as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
It will be in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "that you will <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H376>me<s%> 'my husband,' and no longer <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1180>me<s%> 'my master.'
For I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> out of her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and they will no longer be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for them with the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and with the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and with the creeping <S%H7431>things<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and will make them lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H983>safely.<s%>

I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to me <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H781>Yes,<s%> I will betroth you to me in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> in <S%H4941>justice,<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and in <S%H7356>compassion.<s%>
I will even <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to me in <S%H530>faithfulness;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> I will <S%H6030>respond,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and they will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
and the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> and the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil;<s%> and they will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> her to me in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and I will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on her who had not obtained <S%H7355>mercy;<s%> and I will <S%H559>tell<s%> those who were not my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'You are my people;' and they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'My God!'"
